amendment.description: An amendment numbered 129 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit any funds from being used to implement or enforce the Administration's NEPA Phase 1 regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A079) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A079) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A079) Agreed to by voice vote.
